questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Aquatic or marine life
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A fish swimming in clear water
B) A fish being caught
C) A fish in an aquarium tank
D) A fish in a polluted water body

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The water
B) The fish
C) The surrounding environment
D) The sky

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A rock
B) A fish
C) A plant
D) A leaf

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Trees
B) Sand or gravel
C) Other fish
D) Plants

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A fish
B) A rock
C) A leaf
D) A shell

What color is the fish in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Grey
D) Green

What is the texture of the surface below the fish?
A) Rocky
B) Sandy
C) Muddy
D) Grassy

What can be seen floating near the fish?
A) A leaf
B) A piece of trash
C) A small fish
D) A piece of food

What is the color of the water in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Clear
D) Murky

What is the fish's position in the water?
A) Near the surface
B) At the bottom
C) Mid-water
D) On the shore

What is the condition of the water in the photo?
A) Clean
B) Polluted
C) Murky
D) Foamy

What is the size of the fish relative to the objects in the photo?
A) Larger than the leaf
B) Smaller than the leaf
C) Same size as the leaf
D) Not comparable

What is the shape of the object floating near the fish?
A) Round
B) Oval
C) Irregular
D) Square

B) Horizontal
C) Diagonal
D) Upside down

What is the background color in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Brown
D) Yellow

What element is most prominent in the photo?
A) The fish
B) The water
C) The leaf
D) The sand

What is the fish's tail doing in the photo?
A) Curled
B) Straight
C) Fanned out
D) Hidden

What is the fish's head direction in the photo?
A) Upwards
B) Downwards
C) To the left
D) To the right

What is the fish's body pattern?
A) Striped
B) Spotted
C) Solid color
D) Mixed patterns

What is the clarity of the water in the photo?
A) Clear
B) Cloudy
C) Murky
D) Opaque

What is the fish's position relative to the leaf?

B) Below
C) Next to

B) A leaf
C) Another fish

A) Round
B) Forked
C) Straight
D) Curved

B) Lowered
C) Missing
D) Hidden

D) Missing
